txt.en: 'These look so tempting I want to eat one myself! In fact, I think I'll do just that, in the interest of quality control, of course. I would hate to serve my guests a confection that isn't up to my standards....'

The crafting recipe for the strawberry buns can be bartered for from the marriage-wright, Melthend.\n\nStrawberry bun kits can be earned by completing Midsummer quests in Hobbiton-Bywater and at the Party Tree.

'Do you know your way around an oven? I'm expecting a shipment of strawberry buns from a nearby bakery, but have received nothing. If you get your hands on some strawberry bun baking kits and are a good enough cook to bake them, please make three buns and bring them to me.'
A beleaguered marriage-wright, Melthend, has asked you to bake some strawberry buns for an upcoming ceremony.
Without a Hitch - A Celebratory Snack
